casebody.data:
No. 216,

October Term, 1966.

National Labor Relations Board v. Allis-Chalmers Manufacturing Co. et al., Roderick M. Hills, Norbert A. Schlei and James N. Adler on the motion.

388 U. S. 175. Motion of Aerojet-General Corp. for leave to file brief, as amicus curiae, in support of petition granted. Petition for rehearing denied.

Mr. Justice Marshall took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion and petition.
